lead_paragraph: Union representatives for Codelco’s Chuquicamata copper miners in Chile said that last-minute contract talks broke down, ending an effort to head off a strike set to begin on Monday.
snippet: Union representatives for Codelco’s Chuquicamata copper miners in Chile said that last-minute contract talks broke down, ending an effort to head off a strike set to begin on Monday.

headline.main: Contract Talks at Chilean Copper Mine Break Down
headline.print_headline: Contract Talks at Chilean Copper Mine Break Down
